nodes.text: Black Spire Hot Chocolate was a hot, sweet chocolate beverage available at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo and Ronto Roasters in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. The drink was brown in color and served with a topping of shimmery, sugary purple-colored whipped cream.

Black Spire Hot Chocolate was added to the menus of Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo and Ronto Roasters after the initial opening of Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. The menu description is, "Hot chocolate topped with brown sugar whip cream."
